conbody.p: Hive Drift SolutionApache Impala supportData written by the Hive Drift Solution is compatible with Impala.

The Hive Drift Solution currently does not invalidate the Impala metadata cache. To capture metadata changes in the Hive Metastore and refresh the Impala metadata cache, manually run the Impala Invalidate Metadata command.

p.note: You can add a data rule alert on the link to the Hive Metastore destination to let you know when metadata records are passed to the Hive Metastore.
